text:
xiv
How to Read This Book
This book was written to be read linearly, from start to ﬁnish. That being said, if you know the
basics and need help with a speciﬁc method or type of problem, then you can ﬂip straight to
that section and get started. This book was designed for you to read on your workstation, on
the screen, not on a tablet or eReader. My hope is that you have the book open right next to
your editor and run the examples as you read about them.
